key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.csv.EnableGroupFooters
key.description: Defines, whether the CSV data export should export the data-row whenever a group has been finished.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.csv.EnableGroupHeaders
key.description: Defines, whether the CSV data export should export the data-row whenever a group has been started.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.csv.EnableItembands
key.description: Defines, whether the CSV data export should export the data-row whenever a item is printed.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.csv.EnableReportFooter
key.description: Defines, whether the CSV data export should export the data-row whenever the report has been finished.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.csv.EnableReportHeader
key.description: Defines, whether the CSV data export should export the data-row whenever the report has been started.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.csv.Module
key.description: A module definition. Please do not edit this entry.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.csv.Separator
key.description: Defines the column separator, defaults to comma.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.csv.WriteDatarowNames
key.description: Defines whether to write the column names of the datarow into the first row.

key.name: org.pentaho.reporting.engine.classic.core.modules.output.csv.WriteStateColumns
key.description: Defines, whether output will contain some state information columns in addition to the defined data columns. The state columns help to identify the various band types later.
